title: Integrated Encoding-Decoding Instruction for Children at Risk of Reading Disabilities: Enhancing Pre-Service Teacher Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service and in-service teachers to strengthen understanding of educational needs for children at risk of reading difficulties and competency in applying inclusive pedagogical methods

learning_goals: At least three types of assessment tools for encoding and decoding abilities in children at risk of reading disabilities can be selected.
The five-stage model of an integrated encoding-decoding instructional method can be applied to actual lesson design.
At least two strategies for providing personalized feedback to learners through LMS-based formative assessments can be proposed.

resources: LMS Platform (Video, Quiz, Discussion Board Features)
Video Case Materials for Children with Reading Disabilities

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
